title: Issue Form W-2 to an Employee
description: At year-end, a business needs to prepare and issue a Form W-2 to one of its employees.

tasks.description: Compile the employee's total wages, tips, and other compensation for the year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all payroll data for the employee.

tasks.description: Compile the total amounts withheld for federal income tax, Social Security, and Medicare.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all tax withholding data.

tasks.description: Prepare the Form W-2 with all the compiled information and provide it to the employee.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates an accurate Form W-2.
